properties.areaDesc: Waters from Okaloosa-Walton County Line to Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 9:55PM CST until February 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...North to northeast winds 18 to 23 kt with gusts up to 25
kt. Seas 4 to 6 ft.

* WHERE...Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS from 20 to
60 NM and Waters from Okaloosa Walton County Line FL to
Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Thursday to 6 AM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY
